Little China Bakery

By Jinyan Guo and Jenny Wu

Our mission is to introduce traditional Chinese Cuisine and recipes to a western audience through the Little China Bakery.
We hope to translate recipes that may not otherwise be accessible to an english speaking audience.

Little China Bakery is not just about recipes

You are only a few steps away from your first homemade mooncake!
And learn some funny history about Chinese cuisine.

With our website, you are able to learn not only how to make tasty Chinese inspired dessert but also some stories about traditional Chinese cuisine.

In addition, we provide you with links to purchase special tools and ingredients that are mentioned in recipes, making the baking experience hassle-free.

If that is what you are looking for, mark our website now!
